publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3537 Mrs Nanette Milne: World Radiography Day 2005—That the Parliament welcomes World Radiography Day 2005 on 8 November; notes the important role of diagnostic and therapeutic radiographers in Scotland’s health system; notes that essential screening services provide an absolutely invaluable method of early detection of many life-threatening diseases, and further notes the current shortage of radiographers in Scotland. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Fiona Hyslop*, Richard Lochhead*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr David Davidson*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Margaret Mitchell*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Frances Curran*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3537 Mrs Nanette Milne: World Radiography Day 2005—That the Parliament welcomes World Radiography Day 2005 on 8 November; notes the important role of diagnostic and therapeutic radiographers in Scotland’s health system; notes that essential screening services provide an absolutely invaluable method of early detection of many life-threatening diseases, and further notes the current shortage of radiographers in Scotland. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Robin Harper, Rob Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Brian Adam, Eleanor Scott, Fiona Hyslop, Richard Lochhead, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Tommy Sheridan, Mr David Davidson, Murray Tosh, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Margaret Mitchell, Shiona Baird, Frances Curran, Donald Gorrie, Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Bill Aitken*
S2M-3537 World Radiography Day 2005 (lodged on 8 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
